thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mybet Holding Adjusts 2017 Sales And Earnings Forecast

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mybet Holding Adjusts 2017 Sales And Earnings Forecast
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Mybet Holding SE:
* DGAP-ADHOC: MYBET HOLDING SE: ADJUSTMENT TO 2017 SALES AND EARNINGS FORECAST
* CURRENTLY ASSUME THAT 2017 SALES REVENUES AMOUNTED TO 34.5 TO 35.0 MILLION EUROS
* CURRENTLY ASSUME THAT 2017 EBIT WAS AROUND 1.0 MILLION EUROS (MOST RECENTLY: 2.5 TO 3.0 MILLION EUROS)
* REASONS FOR ADJUSTMENT ARE DELAYS IN ONLINE BUSINESS IN COMPANYâ€˜S CORE MARKETS, GREECE AND GHANA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
